thread.title: Nvidia launches GeForce Now streaming video game network
thread.title_full: Nvidia launches GeForce Now streaming video game network - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Benny Evangelista
title: Nvidia launches GeForce Now streaming video game network
text:
This Nvidia screen shot shows some of the games available to stream on the new GeForce Now network for Nvidia Shield owners This Nvidia screen shot shows some of the games available to stream...
Nvidia’s video game streaming network switches from a free beta to a full subscription service under a new name Thursday as the graphics chipmaker tries to increase sales of its Shield home TV console. This Nvidia screen shot shows some of the games available to stream on the new GeForce Now network for Nvidia Shield owners This Nvidia screen shot shows some of the games available to stream...
Nvidia’s video game streaming network switches from a free beta to a full subscription service under a new name Thursday as the graphics chipmaker tries to increase sales of its Shield home TV console.
